panels.description: The number of online instances (those who have JVM uptime metric) per job (environment). Because it uses the jvm_uptime metric, there is a possibility that you will not see environments where JVM can't go online (continuous restarts etc).
panels.title: The number of JVM uptime reporters

panels.description: The percentage of ram usage by host
panels.title: RAM usage

panels.description: Percentage of average CPU usage by host
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Just total number of current server errors - total number of server errors by offset
panels.title: Service errors by JVM

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.5, sum(rate(request_time_seconds_bucket{job=~".*$Env-$ComponentName.*",service=~"$Service", method=~"$ServiceMethod"}[$__interval])) by (job, service, method, le)) >= 0

panels.description: The percentage of occupied storage memory
panels.title: Storage usage

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(request_time_seconds_bucket{job=~".*$Env-$ComponentName.*",service=~"$Service", method=~"$ServiceMethod"}[$__interval])) by (job, service, method, le)) >= 0
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(db_query_time_seconds_bucket{job=~".*$Env-$ComponentName.*",repository=~"$Repository", method=~"$DBMethod"}[$__interval])) by (job, repository, method, le)) >= 0
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(db_query_time_seconds_bucket{job=~".*$Env-$ComponentName.*",repository=~"$Repository", method=~"$DBMethod"}[$__interval])) by (job, repository, method, le)) >= 0

panels.description: Number of in-flight requests on metrics collection moment
panels.title: Concurrent requests

panels.description: Just rate the number of requests
panels.title: Rate of requests

panels.description: Contains a number of the last synced block by the wallet and the next block number to sync by the prism node

targets.legendFormat: Next block to sync by prism-node Job:[{{job}}] Instance:[{{instance}}]
Last block synced by wallet Job:[{{job}}] Instance:[{{instance}}]

panels.title: Block sync status

panels.description: Rate of received Atala operations by the prism node
panels.title: Received atala operations

panels.description: The rate of the number of errors caused by storing Atala objects
panels.title: Failed to store atala objects

panels.description: The rate of processed Atala blocks operations
panels.title: Processed Atala block operations

panels.description: The rate of failed to process Atala block operations
panels.title: Failed to process atala block operations
